headline: Entergy (NYSE:ETR) Completes US$1.3B Follow-on Equity Offering at US$84 Per Share
summary: Entergy (NYSE:ETR) successfully completed a follow-on equity offering on March 17, 2025, raising $1.3 billion, and simultaneously filed for an additional offering, indicating strong market interest and a significant capital raising strategy. These equity offerings during a challenging market period, where major indexes like the Dow and S&P 500 experienced declines, likely contributed to the company's share price increase of 14% over the last quarter. Despite a decrease in net income reported...

headline: Entergy Corporation announces pricing of common stock offering with a forward component
summary: Entergy Corporation (NYSE: ETR) announced today the pricing of a registered underwritten offering of 15,568,863 shares of its common stock at a price to the public of $83.50 per share. Subject to certain conditions, all shares are expected to be borrowed by the forward counterparties (as defined below) (or their respective affiliates) from third parties and sold to the underwriters and offered in connection with the forward sale agreements described below. Morgan Stanley, BofA Securities, J.P. M
